api.InternalError: Server is experiencing some issues, please retry later
api.Unknown: An unknown error occured, please retry later and if the problem persist contact the support
api.PwdLength: Wrong password length, should be between 8 and 34 characters
api.WrongRequest: The parameters sent could not be processed
api.NoCreationAccount: The account could not be created
api.NoMatch: Your email or password didn't match
api.Suspended: Your account was suspended, please contact the support
api.AccountCreatedError: Your account was created but an error occured while trying to create your new profile. Please contact the support

privacy.confDesc: Confidential: Will require specific access or only work with zero knowledge to get info on this data
privacy.intDesc: Internal only: will be available to the company requesting the data and providing the information
privacy.restDesc: Restricted: will be given to people holding group token who are allowed access
privacy.addDesc: Those contract will create AcessToken that you can sell in the market place in order to let others use your restricted data. Each nft will hold its own information and internal / confidential can be used to create statistics if the condition are satisfied
privacy.available: Select fields the contract can view
privacy.name: Contract's name

cfDel: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

forms.wallet: This forms rewards you when your data are used in analytics contracts. Connect your wallet to sign your request and receive rewards when your data are used!
forms.confidential: Those data can't be accessed by the company, they will be encrypted and only some formula will be made to use those data. For exemple age > 10
forms.internal: Those data can be accessed by the company only, they won't be shared to anyone else
forms.restricted: Those data can be used for marketing purpose and access given to third party company. While accessing those data and if your wallet was used you may receive some rewards

place.connect: Please connect to your wallet to view the list
